attributes.action: Reverse his decision to obliterate Britannia from our coinage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britannia has been a patriotic symbol on our coins since 1672 and people have fought and died to save symbols.
This decision does not equate with the Prime Minister's statement to 'preserve Britishness'.
I call upon all those who believe we should retain an essential part of our history, culture and heritage to sign this petition.
Our country-Britain-was named after Britannia.Do not let it die.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
